Instruction: App to track OCTranspo Stops and Trips information 
 * On the main screen enter a Bus Stop number and click Add Stop to add the stop in the list 
 * Click on one of the stops in the list to get Bus Route information for that stop 
 ** A list will show Route Number, Direction and Destination for all the routes through that stop 
 * Click on one of the Bus Route to get the next three Trip information for that route on that stop 
 ** A list will show next three Trips with Bus Start Time, Bus Position(Latitude and Longitude), Bus speed, Average Delay 
 ** App will also show the average delay for the trips
